headline: Pinnacle West (PNW): Profit Margin Drops to 11%, Raising Questions for Bulls Ahead of Earnings
summary: Pinnacle West Capital (PNW) posted a net profit margin of 11%, down from 12.7% the previous year, as earnings fell by an average of 0.9% per year over the last five years. While profit growth has not picked up and earnings contracted over the last twelve months, forecasts show earnings set to grow at 10.4% per year, trailing the broader US market's 16.1% outlook. Revenue growth is expected to come in at 4.7% annually, below the US market average of 10.5%, yet the company’s earnings are still...
